name: The Choir
description:
'''The Choir''' is an [[Dream pop|atmospheric]] [[alternative rock]] band currently comprising [[Derri Daugherty]] on [[guitar]] and lead vocals, [[Steve Hindalong]] on [[drum]]s and [[Percussion instrument|percussion]], and Dan Michaels on [[saxophone]] and [[Lyricon]]. Long-time [[bass guitar]]ist [[Tim Chandler]] died in 2018, and guitarist [[Marc Byrd]] was the fifth member of the band between 2005â€“2014. The Choir's industry accolades include a [[GMA Dove Award]] for Alternative/Modern Rock Album of the Year in 1996 and a [[Grammy]] nomination for Best Rock Gospel Album at the [[44th Annual Grammy Awards]] in 2002.

As of 2025, the band has commercially released 21 full-length [[Album#Studio|studio albums]], three [[Extended play|EPs]], eight [[Album#Live|live albums]], one single-disc [[compilation album]], one retrospective [[box set]], and is still actively recording new material.
